speech: The application process involves three steps: 1. Gather the required documents and references ahead of time; 2. Fill out, sign and submit the electronic application form.3. Track, view, print and update your Student Aid Report (SAR). This page has more details: https://mygpslifeplan.org/app/answers/detail/a_id/4830
Sorry, it's more complicated than this Computer can say quickly and succinctly. If you go the following site, you will be better informed. https://mygpslifeplan.org/app/answers/detail/a_id/4830
The best way will be to fill out the Free Application for Financial Student Aid, or FAFSA, here: https://fafsa.ed.gov/
